hadiths.text: Narrated Humaid bin `Abdur-Rahman bin `Auf:that in the year he performed Hajj. he heard Mu'awiya bin Abi Sufyan, who was on the pulpit and was taking a tuft of hair from one of his guards, saying, "Where are your religious learned men? I heard Allah's Messenger (ï·º) forbidding this (false hair) and saying, 'The children of Israel were destroyed when their women started using this
